title: Why is your shop no longer avaiable?

embed.description: The personalized League of Legends discounts found in the "Your Shop" feature are back in the client for a limited time with six unique skins depending on who you play the most.After taking some time off from giving players special discounts for their champions' cosmetics, Your Shop is back [...]

body:
Yesterday(18.9.2017) I saw the "your shop" button next to the "Free champion rotation button", so I clicked it and I saw the reduced skins one of them was "reindeer{{champion:96}} " so I bought some rp and now the button isnÂ´t longer there and the articel from riot on the homepage in the client also no longer excists. So why did riot removed it and if they release it again do i have the "reindeer{{champion:96}} "? 
Thx for answers :)

replies.body: You can get the discount back when you contact the support about that skin you wanted to buy. You'll still need to buy that skin now, but they get you the discount somehow.

First: these are the german boards, for engish answers you should go to the english version.

The shop was bugged and showed most of the time no skins that where chosen based on the champions you play, but completly random ones.
After the shop is fixed you sadly have to roll again for your shopitems. The chance to get Kog'Maws skin again is there but its not guaranteed. :/
They can't just let the people roll again. That would be really unfair, i bought RP for  2 Skins of the Shop too.
Same :( isn't there any chance of getting the first set of skins back?
It will come back soon. The reason it was disabled were a few bugs like loading forever and other things..
